content.rendered:
Top merchant services company for
small businesses in Los Angeles

We’re more than just a debit and credit card processing company. We’re dedicated to your success. From the best rates, to PCI compliant service, to round-the-clock customer service, we’re here for you.

Contact Sales

Our banking and technology partners

Payment processing that's secure and easy

Get up and running, fast, whether you need EMV terminals, virtual terminals, POS systems, or other hardware and software to run your business.

Protect your business with PCI compliance, EMV security, and more.

Get cutting edge security when you sign up with Dynamic Merchant Solutions. From EMV encryption, to PCI compliance, to protection from data breaches, we lessen your liability at every turn. As a valued service provider on the Visa Global Registry, we’re committed to safeguarding your business.

There’s no better time than now to upgrade to an EMV chip card reader!

Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers top-of-the-line EMV chip card processing devices. Our experts can help you integrate your new equipment into your current system so there’s no interruption in your payment processing. The only difference: your business will be able to process EMV’s secure payments, reducing fraud and chargebacks!

01 02

What Our Clients Say
About Dynamic Merchant Solutions.

We’re a leading merchant services company in Los Angeles

Maria Mak

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

Mikaela Stone

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

Chris Mathew

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

Start Selling with

Dynamic Merchant
Solutions.

Request a free quote from a top merchant payment
service in Los Angeles.

Apply now and get
approved as soon as 24
hours.
